entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is talking to Harry. She is described as having a patient air and explaining things to Harry.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as the girl that Roger Davies asked out. She is also mentioned as someone who used to go and snog Cedric in a tea shop.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who had a date with Cho. He is described as being tactless and outraged.

entities.name: roger davies
entities.description: Roger Davies is mentioned as someone who asked out Cho.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone that Cho used to go and snog in a tea shop.

relationships.description: Harry had a date with Cho, but it ended badly.
Hermione is friends with Harry and tries to explain things to him.
